https://tmrev.io/movie/346597-A Family's Fury 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Five kids are rescued from troubled situations and are adopted by a loving couple. All is well until tragedy strikes their new family, once again leaving the children without a family. As adults they come together and use their unique gifts to find those responsible and exact revenge. A Family's Fury
